description: Trapped in a failing cabin aboard a derelict spacecraft orbiting a dead planet.

rooms.description: Broken panels flicker erratically. A viewport reveals the planets red storms.
Your cryopod lies shattered. A log recorder blinks with a red light.
Pipes hiss steam. A reactor core pulses weakly in the gloom.

panel.name: Control Panel
panel.description: A damaged control panel with flickering displays.

helmet.description: A cracked but functional EVA helmet.

console.name: Navigation Console
console.description: The ship's navigation system, barely operational.

cryopod.name: Cryogenic Pod
cryopod.description: Your shattered sleeping pod, covered in frost.

log_recorder.name: Audio Log Recorder
log_recorder.description: A device holding audio logs from the crew.

reactor.description: The ship's failing reactor, pulsing with unstable energy.
